data.account_locked: This account has been locked. Please check your email for further instructions.
data.auth_error: Sorry, it appears your email or PIN is invalid.
data.auth_unknown_error: Well this is embarrassing, an error occurred while trying to log you in.
data.bad_pin: We're so sorry, the PIN you entered could not be used. Please enter a different PIN

validation.expiration_in_past: Expiration cannot be in the past.
validation.pan_not_valid: We're sorry. That does not look like a valid credit card number.
validation.cvv_not_valid: Security Code is missing or invalid
validation.zip_not_valid: Zip Code is missing or invalid
validation.street_too_long: Street must be less than 128 characters.
validation.city_too_long: City must be less than 128 characters.

errors.device_loading: We're sorry, there was an error while trying to load your card onto your device. Please try again.
errors.device_loading_timeout: We're sorry, but there was a timeout waiting for your card to load onto your device. Please try again.
errors.device_loading_unknown: We're sorry, there was an unknown error loading your card onto your device. Please try again.
errors.generic_loading_error: Something went wrong. Please try adding your card again.
errors.not_supported: We're incredibly sorry, but this particular card is not currently supported. Please try another card
errors.missing_security_info: We're incredibly sorry, It seems the device is missing critical security information that's required with this card
errors.no_further_action: No further action is allowed for this card {{short_desc ? '\'' + short_desc + '\'' : ''}} ending in •••• {{last_four}}.  Please contact your issuing bank.
errors.provision_failed: The card {{short_desc ? '\'' + short_desc + '\'' : ''}} ending in •••• {{last_four}} could not be added to your wallet at this time. Please try again later.
errors.card_load_error: Sorry, something went wrong when loading your card. Please try again later.
errors.card_deleted: Your card could not be added to your wallet at this time. Please try again later.
errors.server_unavailable: The server is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
errors.max_card_type_exceeded: You cannot add any more of this type of card. If you believe this message is in error, please reset your device.

data.card_already_added: This card is already in your wallet.
data.card_declined: Sorry, this card was declined. If you feel this decline was an error, please contact your issuing bank.
data.card_loading_error: This is kinda embarrassing, there was an error loading this card.
data.card_not_eligible: This Card Is Not Eligible for Tokenization
data.card_not_exists: The card you're trying to view does not exist, weird!
data.card_setup_progress: Please wait while we setup your card...
data.card_setup_rejected: We're sorry, but it appears the bank has rejected your card.  Perhaps you didn't input something correctly, please try again
data.card_validating: Please wait while we validate your card...
data.cards_loading_error: This is kinda embarrassing, there was an error loading your credit cards.
data.cards_remove_error: Sorry, an error occurred deleting your cards, please try again later.
data.check_your_email: Check your email for further instructions.
data.confirm_action: Are you sure? This action cannot be undone.
data.confirm: This will open another app. Continue?
data.dan_msg: When you pay, this number is used in place of your true card number.  It may only be used with this device.
data.device_init_error_action: Please reset your device using the Reset My Wallet link
data.email_in_use: We're sorry, that email address is already in use. Are you sure you don't already have an account?
data.get_terms_error: Error getting issuer terms and conditions
data.incorrect_pin: Sorry, the PIN you provided is incorrect.
data.invalid_configuration_description: We're so incredibly sorry about this, but the application has been launched with an invalid configuration and is unable to continue. This is so embarrassing!
data.invalid_authentication_description: We're so incredibly sorry about this, but the application has been launched with an invalid/expired authentication and is unable to continue. This is so embarrassing!
data.lost_device: Has your wallet been lost or stolen?
data.lost_device_description: If you are not sure where your device containing your wallet is you can suspend the credit card tokens in your wallet and reset your device
data.max_cards_reached_message: You reached the maximum number of allowable credit cards.
data.network_error: Unable to reach server. Please check your internet connection and try again.

errors.incorrect_code: The code entered is incorrect, please try again
errors.exceeded_code_retries: Maximum attempts have been exceeded, please select another verification method
errors.expired_code: The code that was entered is expired
errors.incorrect_tav: Sorry an error occured, please use a different method to authorize your card
errors.expired_session: Your session has expired, please exit the wallet and try again
errors.app_to_app_not_supported: Sorry, app to app verification is not currently supported
errors.app_to_app_declined: Sorry, app to app verification was declined

data.pin_repeating_number: PIN must not be a repeating number
data.pin_reset_description: Forgot your PIN? No problem. Simply enter your email and we will send you a link to reset it.
data.pin_reset_error: Well that didn't work at all... Try again later, sorry!
data.pin_reset_success: You have successfully reset your pin
data.reset_device: Reset Device and Suspend Tokens in my Wallet
data.reset_device_description: This will erase all of the cards in your wallet and on your device. Please enter your PIN to confirm this action.
data.reset_password_bad_link: This reset password link is not valid. If you would like to request a new reset link click "Reset PIN"
data.reset_wallet_empty_pin: Please provide your PIN to reset your wallet.
data.reset_wallet_success: You have successfully reset your wallet
data.suspend_msg: Turning on will temporarily suspend this card.

statuses.sync_error: Syncing error. Restart the app or contact support.

data.unknown_error: We're so sorry, there appears to be a problem.

verification.call_bank_result: Call your bank to activate your card at
verification.manned_call_bank: Call your bank to speak to customer service at
verification.manned_call_bank_result: Call your bank to speak to customer service representative at
verification.description: Your bank would like to use data already on file to verify that you are the cardholder.
verification.visit_website: Visit website to receive a verification code at
verification.visit_website_result: Visit website to receive a code at
verification.email_result: A verification code has been emailed to
verification.text_consent: By selecting my mobile number, I consent to receive a one-time text message containing a verification code to validate my account. Message and data rates may apply.
verification.text_result: A verification code has been texted to
verification.call_for_otp: Call your bank's automated customer service for a verification code at
verification.call_for_otp_result: Call your bank's automated customer service for a verification code at
verification.agent_call_cardholder: Have your banks automated service call you to provide a one-time password
verification.agent_call_cardholder_result: Your request to have the automated service call you with a verification code has been submitted. You will receive a call from

data.verification_selection_failed: This verification method is not currently valid. Please try again later or use a different verification method.
data.wallet_create_description: You must set up a 4 digit PIN to protect your wallet from mischievous rapscallions.
data.wallet_create_not_allowed_description: We're sorry about this, but you must create a wallet from your mobile app with your device attached.
data.wallet_empty_message: Add a new credit or debit card at any time using the plus-button above.
data.wallet_exists: It appears you have already created a wallet, please enter your PIN.
data.wallet_load_error_message: Oops, it looks like there was a problem loading your wallet
data.privacy_policy_loading_error: Sorry, an error has occurred. We are currently unable to get the privacy policy. Please try again later.
data.terms_loading_error: Sorry, an error has occurred. We are currently unable to get the terms and conditions. Please try again later.
